content_blocks.content_html:
Our Mission is Simple

 

Most software companies try to do more than they should and are forced to charge more than is necessary.

We do the opposite.

blocks.content_html:
Raising prices is a common strategy to enable revenue growth. Justification for increased price for existing customers comes via new features and capabilities.

This makes most products expensive, unnecessarily complex, and built for maximum revenue rather than maximum value.

Our goal is to provide lean, and highly targeted software for the lowest price possible.

blocks.heading_html: Price is the beating heart of our philosophy
blocks.content_html:
SaaS pricing models are deliberately confusing. 

This can be very frustrating to customers who find endless lists of product levels, cost per user, add-ons, ala carte features, and various other nickel-and-dime strategies.

At Lean20 we keep price simple, transparent, and aggressively low.

content_blocks.content_html:
Lean20 is a company purpose-built with attention to what matters most and ruthless determination to cut away that which doesn't. Our philosophy has direct application to all aspects of running the business.

We are bootstrapped and intend to stay that way. No outside investors, no capital raised, and no urgency to drive revenue.

From operations, marketing, sales, and software development we continually and consistently apply the 20% rule to everything we do.

SEO_options.title: Lean20 company philosophy
SEO_options.image: Our goal is to provide lean, and highly targeted software for the lowest price possible.

blocks.heading_html: Uptime monitoring, status pages, and knowledge bases made easy.
blocks.content_html: We've got the essentials covered. Focus on building your business without the stress of uncontrollably expanding 3rd-party software budgets.
Communicate service outages to your customers with a public status page. The best part: it's free.
Monitor the availability of your web site, application, and other managed services.
Help your customers by giving them an easy-to-use knowledge base.

content_blocks.content_html:
The Lean20 Vision

The idea is simple.
Venture-scale companies are pressured with relentless pursuit of revenue growth which has an inevitable impact on software complexity and price.

Commodity services.
Cloud computing allows us to reduce many products to only the features truly needed for the lowest possible price.

The 80/20 rule.
80% of software features are used by less than 20% of users. Our focus is eliminating those, supporting only the highest value functionality.

Bootstrapped and hand-crafted.
We never outsource development. We are built with love from Seattle and have the experience and passion to keep it that way.

SEO_options.title: Essential tools for small and early stage companies
SEO_options.description: Lean20 creates simple products with big value. 80% of software features are never used - we focus on the 20% that are.

blocks.content_html:
Uptime monitoring, status pages, and knowledge bases made easy.

At the heart of our philosophy is a focus on value over revenue. We believe in this so we decided to launch our first product 100% free, forever. It's our way to show you what we are about right from the start.
Communicate service outages to your customers with a public status page. The best part: it's free.
Monitor the availability of your web site, application, and other managed services.
Help your customers by giving them an easy-to-use knowledge base.

blocks.content_html:
A simplified knowledge base built for you

Easily create help documentation, FAQs, product support, and more.

content_blocks.heading: Help your customers by giving them an easy-to-use knowledge base.

statistics.heading: Branding
statistics.text: Your logo, colors, and a custom domain. We never charge for things that should be free.

statistics.heading: Intuitive
statistics.text: An easy-to-use editor will let you build your help docs fast.

statistics.heading: Searching
statistics.text: Enable easy discovery of relevant content quickly.

statistics.heading: No Limits
statistics.text: Unlimited users and help articles. No arbitrary limits to hold you back.

content_blocks.content_html:
We are still building Docs. Our goal is to provide you a simplified product at a fair price.

 Request early access now to be notified as soon as it is ready.

SEO_options.title: Lean20 Docs - Documentation made easy for both your content editors and users
SEO_options.description: Lean20 Docs is a simple knowledge base software to manage your customer-facing help content.

blocks.content_html:
Track and monitor your website's availability and performance for a fraction of what you're paying now

Monitor uptime now with a free trial. No credit card required.

content_blocks.heading: Real-time monitoring, alerting, and reporting. Simple

statistics.heading: Uptime Monitoring
statistics.text: Test whether your site is available from all over the world every minute of every day.

statistics.heading: Alerting
statistics.text: You and your team will get notified if your site is slow or not available via configurable alerts.

statistics.heading: Reporting
statistics.text: Your data stored forever, ready and available for compliance and operational discovery.

statistics.heading: No Limits
statistics.text: Unlimited users, monitors, data, and events.  No arbitrary limits to hold you back.

content_blocks.content_html:
Get started with a free trial

Start Today

No Credit card required

SEO_options.title: Lean20 Ping - Uptime monitoring for pennies a day
SEO_options.description: Lean20 Ping is an efficient and inexpensive replacement for products like Pingdom, purpose-built for small and early stage companies

blocks.content_html:
Instantly report application status and maintenance windows to your users.

100% free, forever.

content_blocks.heading: Status reporting for all of your customer-facing applications.

statistics.heading: Incident Management
statistics.text: Manage planned and unplanned events as they develop.

statistics.heading: Notifications
statistics.text: Notify customers in real-time as incidents are managed and resolved.

statistics.heading: Compliance
statistics.text: Supplying a public status page is a compliance requirement. Use our solution at zero cost.

statistics.heading: No Limits
statistics.text: Unlimited users, pages, subscribers, and events.  No arbitrary limits to hold you back.

content_blocks.content_html:
Free forever, get started today!

After analyzing the costs associated with managing status pages, we determined it was literally pennies a month. Part of our strategy is to keep price for our customers in line with the actual costs associated with providing products.

Lean20 Status is free forever. No strings attached - it is our way of introducing customers to our philosophy and building a trust relationship.

Sign up for Lean20 Status today and get started for literally zero.

Start Today

SEO_options.title: Lean20 Status - Trust and compliance without breaking the bank
SEO_options.description: Lean20 Status manages customer-facing incident tracking, reporting, and alerting. Free forever, no strings attached.
